thread.title: Vince Carter ejected after throwing vicious elbow
thread.title_full: Vince Carter ejected after throwing vicious elbow

title: Vince Carter ejected after throwing vicious elbow
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Vince Carter ejected after throwing vicious elbow Whoa. Vince Carter ejected after throwing vicious elbow Whoa. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/vince-carter-ejected-dropping-devin-booker-vicious-elbow-suns-grizzlies Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address.   Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Vince Carter ejected after throwing vicious elbow Andrew Joseph 9:03 p.m. ET Feb. 28, 2017 2 Shares 
Do not make Vince Carter angry. It won't end well. Just ask Devin Booker. 
During Tuesday's Suns-Grizzlies game, Carter was agitated after a foul from Booker. When Booker followed Carter as he mockingly continued a drive to the basket, Carter hit Booker with a shocking elbow. 
Seriously, he dropped Devin Booker. Carter must not have the patience to deal with these young players. 
That understandably set off a scuffle as officials rushed to separate Carter from the Suns. 
Booker would be OK, and Carter was hit with a flagrant-2 foul and ejected. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/vince-carter-ejected-dropping-devin-booker-vicious-elbow-suns-grizzlies Most Popular
